description: Baseline sanity: local demo server, no loss/jitter.
3s delay + 20% loss + 300ms jitter (disaster worst-case).
Jitter 350ms spike: reorder/timeout/backoff stability check.
25% loss: retry backoff and stability check.
High concurrency burst: PPS and throughput durability.
Mid-load sustained run: watch for leaks and drift.
Intermittent drop: 20% loss + small delay to verify recovery.
Harsh flap: 1.3s interval blackouts (0.25s) + light loss; focus on recovery.
Gentler flap: shorter blackout with heartbeat/retry emphasis.
MTU variation approximation: smaller buffer + mild loss/jitter.
10MB body via demo server to stress compression/streaming.
3000-fetch like load with mild loss/jitter.
